Smart Umbrella: A high-tech umbrella with built-in sensors and GPS that can detect rain and wind patterns, adjusting its shape and size accordingly. It can also track your location and provide real-time weather updates, ensuring you stay dry and comfortable.

Solar-Powered Umbrella: An umbrella with a built-in solar panel that charges your devices on the go. With its compact design, you can keep your phone, camera, or other gadgets charged even when you're caught in a sudden rainstorm.

Personalized Umbrella: An umbrella with a customizable design that allows you to create a unique and personalized look. You can choose from a variety of colors, patterns, and even add your name or initials to make it stand out.

Air Purifying Umbrella: An umbrella with a built-in air purifier that can remove pollutants and allergens from the air. This is especially useful for people who suffer from respiratory problems or live in areas with high levels of air pollution.

Weather-Proof Umbrella: An umbrella made from a special material that can withstand extreme weather conditions, such as strong winds, heavy rain, or even hail. This umbrella can provide you with reliable protection no matter what the weather brings.
